department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: The Royal Military College (RMC) of Canada, Department of Civil Engineering, has a requirement to acquire a high-speed three-dimensional (3D) Digital Image Correlation, non-contact, monitoring and data acquisition and analysis system, as well as compatible low- and high-speed cameras.
description: The bid must include a full description of the proposed product and service, including the list of all the deliverables (drawings, specifications, etc.), and fully specify all the component inputs outputs and costs, including all trade agreements, demands, and needs in which the contract is required to provide. The closing date for receiving the bid is November 7th at 2:00 p.m.
